permission.name: Administrate
permission.description: Ability to view and edit website-mechanical information, such as user account tables, login information, and system controls. An ADM:0 user would generally be an average user, and an ADM:4 user is probably a webmaster and server admin.

permission.name: Personal
permission.summary: Ability to link Nius with NPH
permission.description: Ability to see information which links Nius' IRL identity with his Nius Atreides persona. An NPH:0 user will be none the wiser about Nius' real identity, while an NPH:2 user will be able to see complete IRL contact details for Nius.

permission.name: Commentary
permission.description: Ability to leave publicly visible feedback on the website, such as commentary on blog posts. A COM:0 user will experience UGC as read-only, while a COM:1 user will experience it in much the way one interacts with a forum.

permission.name: Service: FileDump
permission.summary: Ability to use the FileDump service
permission.description: Ability to upload files via the FileDump service. An SFD:0 user will have no idea that the SFD service exists, while an SFD:2 user will be able to use the service without restriction.

permission.name: Service: Achievements
permission.summary: Ability to use the Achievements service
permission.description: Ability to track and accumulate achievements on the Achievements service. Most users are ACH:1; ACH:0 is an active bar of usage. ACH:2 is a service administrator with ability to create and modify achievements.

permission.name: DrCharlesHarrell.com Primary User
permission.summary: Ability to submit and edit content on DrCharlesHarrell.com (charles.harrell-family.net).
permission.description: This is intended solely for Charles Harrell himself, plus whatever top-level administrative users which have the ability to act on his behalf. This permission should be considered access for a primary user and not an administrative permission.

permission.name: Service: Homepage
permission.summary: Ability to use the Homepage service
permission.description: Ability to create and access a customized homepage on the NiusWorks server.

permission.name: Service: Financial Projector
permission.summary: Ability to use the Financial Projector service
permission.description: Ability to access Nius' financial projections.
